text: MEg was responsible for the study design and performed the statistical analysis, provided analysis and interpretation of data, and carried out the virucidal tests with MVA. ME carried out the virucidal tests with EBOV and provided analysis and interpretation of data. KK carried out the virucidal tests with EBOV. JZ participated in the original planning and design of the study and contributed to the interpretation of results as well as to the manuscript. KR participated in the original planning and design of the study and contributed to the interpretation of results as well as to the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
